content.description: Face climb the right side of big white patch to the right side of the prominent roof.  Pass the roof on it's right side pulling slightly left into a shallow brown corner below the top anchors.
content.location: Right of "Lightning".  See "Beta" picture for Lightning Bolt Wall.

content.description: Follow "Lightning up to the prominent roof and follow big holds out to the apex of the roof.  Pass the apex on the left side on thin crimps to a big pull to a decent edge.  Continue on easier ground to the top.
content.location: Same start and finish (same top anchors) as Lightning.

content.description: Furthest left route, starts in white streaked dihedral.
content.location: Leftmost route on Lightning Bolt Wall

content.description: Climb grey and white face below a a prominent roof.  Pass the roof on the left side.
content.location: Just right of "All 'Lit Up".  See "Beta" picture for Lightning Bolt Wall.

content.description: Follow a shallow corner to the right side of a shallow arete.
Follow a left trending seam in grey rock to a horizontal crack at mid-height.  Continue straight up to the top anchors.
content.location: Right of "I Saw the Light" second to last route on the right side of the wall.  See "Beta" picture for Lightning Bolt Wall.

content.description: Climb up coarse bubbly rock until you can pull on to a grey face.  Continue up into a prominent corner that leads to the top anchors.
content.location: Furthest right route on the wall.

content.description: Climb white and grey streaked, featured rock up to a short headwall and pull into a very shallow brown corner below the top anchors.
content.location: Right of "Trippin' the Light Fantastic".  See "Beta" picture for Lightning Bolt Wall.

content.description: This is a crunch start on the prominent white'ish blocks a couple feet left of the vertical crack. Start crunched, traverse right through the under cling, horizontal, crack until you arrive at the vertical crack. Use vertical crack for hands while edges and smears for the feet. Top out on easy, but potentially loose, rock.
content.protection: Landing is mainly dirt, brush, and grass. I would recommend a boulder pad but it isn't necessary.
content.location: This climb is located on the right side of the Lighting Bolt Wall. All of the current sport routes are left of this line.

content.description: Start in corner with dark rock and pass a horizontal feature at mid height.  Continue trending slightly left to the top anchors.
content.location: Right of 'Lighten Up.  See "Beta" picture for Lightning Bolt Wall.
